title: Performance Enhancements for Simulations that Target Intrinsically Disordered Proteins (IDPs) with Therapeutic Small Molecules
description: In this engagement, we evaluated the performance characteristics of simulations using GROMACS and PLUMED, which target Intrinsically Disordered Proteins (IDPs) with Therapeutic Small Molecules. After this evaluation, we worked with the PLUMED team to introduce changes that resulted in significant performance improvements.

logos.alt: Gromacs, a free and open-source software suite for high-performance molecular dynamics and output analysis
Plumed, the community-developed PLUgin for MolEcular Dynamics

takeaways.description: Improved the efficiency of metainference simulations with PLUMED
children: Profiled multiple simulations, revealing PLUMED is not a significant bottleneck in these simulations and added documentation so that others can generate profile data
Ensured backward compatibility for existing PLUMED simulations

title: Icetemp: Converting a Jupyter Notebook to a Python Package
description: Icetemp is a numerical heat flow model that infers long-term climate and glacial history using Bayesian inversion of in-situ borehole temperature measurements previously taken in Antarctica. In this engagement, we converted this algorithm, written as a Jupyter Notebook, into a Python package available on PyPi, complete with automated testing and Continuous Integration / Delivery / Deployment.

takeaways.description: Created a professionally tested Python library from Jupyter Notebook code
children: Improved performance of existing model by 20%
Ensured the functionality is open to the science community

title: FastANI: Improving the Quality of a Python Package
description: FastANI is an HPC-oriented Python package to perform whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI). FastANI allows for quickly comparing two genomes to find matches in their genetic structure.

takeaways.description: Improved the quality of the FastANI Python package
children: Developed tests and CI/CD to facilitate future updates
Released a new version of FastANI
